StringTable.Entry: Select whether you want to use the icon pack's rendition of player numbers or the game's. May require a game restart.

The selected icon will start replacing the visible icons with the images you put in. If it can't find the valid image or pack, it will be replaced by the mod's default files. May require a game restart for the in-text icons to change.\nVanilla - No pack selected.

The selected set will start replacing the current silhouettes with ones created from the images you put in. If it can't find the valid image or set, it will be replaced by the mod's default files.\nVanilla - No set selected.
Dictates how the the main UI looks like.
The selected mention style will dictate which icons are used for the icons in text. May require a game restart.
The selected mention style will dictate which icons are used for the icons in text. May require a game restart.
Only icons from the selected faction will appear in vanilla games.
Only icons from the selected faction will appear in btos2 games.
The chance of a different than normal icon appearing for roles.
Toggles whether all of the previously selected icon pack's easter eggs will be used, or only the selected icon pack's.
Enable Easter Eggs In Player Panel
Toggles whether easter egg icons appear or not in the ability panel.
Dictates how long should one iteration of an animation last for.
Dictates how the fire of the main UI loooks like.
Dictates how the paper of the main UI loooks like.
Dictates how the metal of the main UI loooks like.
Dictates how the leather of the main UI loooks like.
Dictates how the wax of the main UI loooks like.
Dictates how the wood of the main UI loooks like.
Toggles whether game sprite sheets are dumped so pack debugging is possible.
Toggles whether the mod dumps info on loaded packs.
Changing this value changes the name text below to appear when mentioning the same number.
When you are jailed by the Jailor, this option makes the old jailor overlay appear on your screen.
When you are jailing someone as the Jailor, this option makes the old jailor overlay appear on your screen.
Modifies the role reveal cinematic to be more customizable, and also includes the character headshot and role icons. Also includes tweaked role reveal cinematics to adapt to the customization.
Name Of The %type% GitHub Repository (Defaults To: RoleIconRecolors)
Name Of The %type% GitHub Repository Owner (Defaults To: AlchlcDvl)
Name Of The %type% GitHub Repository Branch It Is In (Defaults To: main)
Confirm Link Parameters And Generate Link
Toggles patches for the Misc Role Customization section of Fancy UI, due to it having impact on performance. This setting currenly does nothing.
The text that is shown when the player is recruited by the Jackal.
The text that is shown in the role card when the player is a Town Traitor.
The text that is shown in the role card when the player is VIP (Vanilla Games Only).
The text that is shown in chat during court when the Judge speaks (BetterTOS2 Games Only).
The text that is shown in chat during court when anyone other than the Judge speaks (BetterTOS2 Games Only).
The text that is shown in chat at night when being dueled by the Pirate (BetterTOS2 Games Only).
